com.intel.jndn.utils

Interface ContentStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryContentStore

    public interface ContentStore
    Represents a named content store of NDN data which allows querying by name or interest; TODO merge with Repository
    Author:
    Andrew Brown, andrew.brown@intel.com

    • Method Summary

        Check if the content exists
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the content
        Returns:
        true if the content exists

      • has

        boolean has(net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest)
        Check if the content exists
        Parameters:
        interest - a selector-enabled interest to search for content in the store
        Returns:
        true if the content exists

        Optional<net.named_data.jndn.util.Blob> get(net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest)
        Retrieve the content by name
        Parameters:
        interest - the name of the content
        Returns:
        the content if it exists

      • push

        void push(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
          net.named_data.jndn.Name name)
   throws IOException
        Write the stored content to the face as Data packets. If no content exists for the given name, this method should have no effect.
        Parameters:
        face - the face to write to
        name - the name of the data to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if the writing fails

      • push

        void push(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
          net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest)
   throws IOException
        Write the stored content to the face as Data packets. If no content exists for the given name, this method should have no effect.
        Parameters:
        face - the face to write to
        interest - the interest identifying of the data to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if the writing fails

      • clear

        void clear()
        Remove all stored content
